title: Okay enough of fairy cute crazy champions for now when will we get a classic champ again ?
body:
I mean those times there were only champions for those who love unusual mechanics of fairy fantastic colorfull art

when will we get a classic warrior or a character with a medieval gothic style ?

I mean something more like kayle, morde, darius in terms of artistic design ?

we still HAVE NO FIGHTER TOP LANER WITH A SWORD AND A SHIELD !!!

replies.body: Kayn, Ornn, Pyke, and Kai'sa were all pretty badass, unique, or cool champions in their own right. We've gotten 2 "cutesy" champions in the past year. Neeko and Zoe. Is two _really_ that bad compared to the 3-4 "edgy" champions we've gotten?

I think the answer is very obvious.  We will never have another one, because Riot drank the feminist coolaid so if a new champ isn't "diverse"  (and you know what I mean by that) there's no chance in hell it even gets off the drawing table.

You are not making much sense.

This is a video game, and not only a video game, but a roster based game where kits are intrinsically tied to a pre-established character. It's impossible that the character you play as is going to be identical to you because you don't make the character to play; I have no idea what you're even asking for here.

And the vast majority of people don't pick characters based on personal identification. Your impression of everyone picking their character because they supposedly have some close intimate personal connection with or something is once again, something you've pulled out of the aether. If anything, most people either play a character because they fulfill a certain form of power fantasy of theirs in terms of gameplay elements, just to play the meta-game, or because the character is their waifu or something. And you know this.

And also, any fictional story, especially one concerning fucking legends and gods and shit, is never going to involve just humans as characters, as that would be a total waste of the setting. Your implied quest of trying to make League about playing human characters or whatnot is never going to happen in a fantasy setting.

And lastly, people who play animal and non-human characters for the very most part have nothing to do with otherkin or whatnot. Because again, the vast majority of the time it's just Anthropomorphism. It's no different to the little activity people sometimes have about finding their spirit animal or something, and it has nothing to do with mentally identifying as a wild animal. It's just "I think that's cool", and that's it.

.....

And your post makes even less sense in that last part. So you're saying the Kayn joke "was just a good joke". So you're also agreeing on that Kayn has no factor of sexuality in his design given the only thing that has anything to do with it was that joke... so what was "Kayn is gay" all about?

I don't get it.

I felt like her kit was pretty traditional at the very least. The gist of the abilities feel very familiar, other than maybe the passive. 

Also, characters like this have been around since the very beginning. The Yordles alone are kooky and zany, Lulu was probably our earliest "fairy" champion, as you put it. She's from Season 2. 

Pyke wasn't very medieval but he definitely gave off a traditional "pirate ghost story" style. Both Kayle and Morg are about to get a VGU. And the next "chained champ" looks like it might be that style. There are a lot of different tastes in designs that Riot caters to, just be patient. Your time will come.
No, only Kayle is getting a VGU. Morg is just a VU. They scrapped her changes because they didn't like any of them.
You're right. I'm kind of relieved honestly, I always thought Morg's kit was solid. Still, visually they will change, and Kayle will likely give more of that "medieval" vibe with her armor.

Yeah I hope they don't go through with any changes. I'll be fine with a passive change if it's a good one but that's it.

Visually I still love her as well and I'll miss her old theme. I'm a nostalgic person so each update they do, I tend to miss the old one more and more. RIP my Old Galio :(

I'm expecting a visual update along the lines of Warwick; still the same basic design but updated to match modern visuals. Morgana seems like she already has an appealing theme, it just needs to be capitalized on. Like her broken wings and general look are pretty cool elements of her design, but I don't think she necessarily needs to be in a bra only to stay true to the design. Also she has looked like a walking tent for too long.

Pyke, Kai'Sa, Ornn, and Kayn are 4 of the 5 most recent champs lol. We've had one fairy champ, Zoe. (And she's not even a fairy.)  I would be surprised if a top lane champ wasn't released next though, since ornn we've had top, mid, adc, jg/supp, and now mid/supp in that order. Just wait till next champ ig
